Name: each
Desc: Iterates over all nodes in the Q object and executes a callback on each node, providing access to the index and element.
Long Desc: The 'each' method is a utility for iterating over all elements in the Q object. It allows you to execute a callback function for each element, providing access to both the index and the element itself. This is particularly useful for performing operations on each element in a collection, such as applying styles, adding event listeners, or extracting data.
Example: Q('.items').each((i, el) => el.style.color = 'red'); // Changes text color of all items to red
